translations: vt.以耸人听闻的手法处理；使引起轰动

sentences.sentence: When will TOI stop trying to sensationalize news.
sentences.translation: TOI什么时候会停止试图炒作新闻。

sentences.sentence: So it could be typical of the American media to unnecessarily sensationalize things.
sentences.translation: 所以，不必要的炒作通常是美国媒体的典型特征。

sentences.sentence: People tend to want to sensationalize the images and thereby make my clients look like they are ostentatious.
sentences.translation: 人们往往希望炒作这些图像，因此使我的客户看起来像是在炫耀。
